name: Dino Era: Jurassic Blood
description:
It's time for cold blood to meet hot lead in Dino Era: Jurassic Blood!

A fast-paced, first-person shooter and 3D platformer, and love letter to Turok 2: Seeds of Evil. Take on hordes of reptilian foes as you fight your way through 3 unique levels using an arsenal of 6 unique weapons!

Dino Era: Jurassic Blood is the capstone project of a team of game design graduates (under the name Team ManBearPig) from Full Sail University. This was the culmination of 5 months of hard work. Nevertheless, this game is a student project and there are bound to be imperfections.

Dino Era: Jurassic Blood can be played within Itch.io using Unity WebGL for free, or you can download the executable, also at no cost.

Please, take Dino Era: Jurassic Blood as it is, and we hope you enjoy your time playing!

Game Designers:

Lucas Howell, Brett Hodges, Evin Lacy, Rahkeim McCoy, Carl Kolek

Game Artists:

Jaysson Kearney, Lliam Bosaz-Reaves
